alert.note: Alert for Lake Mead National Recreation Area (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 29 at 1:07AM PDT until October 30 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MONDAY... * WHAT...North winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave and Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In California, San Bernardino County- Upper Colorado River Valley. In Nevada, Lake Mead National Recreation Area. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT/MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Dangerous boating conditions on area Lakes.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other lightweight fixtures and unsecured outdoor objects. Operators of motorcycles, vans, campers, trailers, and other high profile vehicles should be especially cautious for the possibility of sudden, strong crosswinds and be prepared for areas of blowing dust which could drastically reduce visibility.
